forest_guardian.name: Forest Guardian

phases.name: Awakening
phases.desc: The ancient tree stirs, roots reaching out like grasping hands.

phases.name: Enraged
phases.desc: Bark cracks as sap bleeds like blood. The guardian roars!

forest_guardian.intro: The very forest screams as the ancient guardian rises from the earth...

bone_dragon.name: Bone Dragon Skelerath

phases.name: Ancient Terror
phases.desc: Skelerath spreads wings of bone that block out all light.

phases.name: Furious Undead
phases.desc: The dragon's eyes glow red with rage. Its attacks double!

phases.name: Death's Last Cry
phases.desc: Bone shards fly as Skelerath enters its final form!

bone_dragon.intro: From the deepest chamber, the earth splits open. An impossibly large skeletal dragon rises, bones grinding against stone...

demon_emperor.name: Demon Emperor Zarael

phases.name: The Emperor Sits
phases.desc: Zarael regards you with contempt. Flames spiral around his throne.

phases.name: Mildly Annoyed
phases.desc: He rises. The air itself burns. 'You survived that? Impressive... barely.'

phases.name: Demon Ascension
phases.desc: Wings of pure flame erupt from his back. Reality cracks around him.

demon_emperor.intro:
The citadel shakes as a voice like thunder echoes through the halls...

'Another adventurer dares enter my domain? How... delightfully suicidal.'

ancient_dragon_kalaros.name: Ancient Dragon Kalaros

phases.name: Watching
phases.desc: Kalaros opens one massive golden eye. The mountain itself trembles.

phases.name: Rising
phases.desc: The dragon stands, wings spreading wide enough to cover the sky.

phases.name: Ancient Wrath
phases.desc: 'In ten thousand years, none have made me bleed. You will SUFFER.'

phases.name: Dragon's Final Breath
phases.desc: Kalaros channels a millennium of rage into one final attack...

ancient_dragon_kalaros.intro:
You step into the dragon's lair. The air is scorching. Gold coins the size of shields litter the floor.

Then ‚Äî a single eye opens in the darkness, larger than a house...

'You have come a very long way to die, little one.'

fallen_god.name: The Fallen God Erathos

phases.name: The Silence Before Oblivion
phases.desc: Everything stops. Light itself dims. A presence older than existence turns its attention to you.

phases.name: Disappointment
phases.desc: 'I once shattered stars for entertainment. You're... less.'

phases.name: Waking Up
phases.desc: 'Hm. Perhaps I should take you seriously.'

phases.name: God's Anger
phases.desc: 'IMPOSSIBLE! How do you still stand?! DIE!'

phases.name: God's Last Resort
phases.desc:
The Fallen God reaches into the void between worlds...
'If I fall... everything falls with me.'

fallen_god.intro:
You reach the peak of the Celestial Spire. There is nothing here... and then everything is here at once.

A being of pure light and shadow that exists in all places simultaneously focuses on you.

The very ground beneath you begins to dissolve.

'...you reached my door. I am almost... curious.'
